title: ‘Our Silence Is Betrayal’ Letter From MM Joshi to Advani Is Fake
subtitle: A letter claimed to have been written by former Bharatiya Janata Party President Murali Manohar Joshi addressed to LK Advani with the news agency ANI’s stamp has been viral on social media.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A letter claimed to have been written by former Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) President Murli Manohar Joshi addressed to LK Advani with the news agency ANI’s watermark has gone viral on social media.

The letter states that the BJP will not be able to score even 120 seats.

“BJP will get barely 8-10 seats in the first phase of Lok Sabha elections 2019 which was held on 91 constituencies of 20 states.”

The letter also says although Joshi was under immense pressure to join Samajwadi Party or Bahujan Samaj Party, he could not leave his home (BJP), however, he was later thrown out of the same house after being insulted.
